column4: there was this program i used to use for monitoring changes to a script, and i cant for the life of me remember what it was called. It would refresh new data on the console and leave the old info there
does anyone know the name of this utility
you can use tripwire to monitor for changes to files
well no im not looking for an IDS, it was a console app that would essentially run any given script repeatedly, updating the fields that were changed
